dependencies.description:
Bazel is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and
Gradle. It uses a human-readable, high-level build language. Bazel
supports projects in multiple languages and builds outputs for multiple
platforms. Bazel supports large codebases across multiple repositories,
and large numbers of users.
dependencies.name: bazel

dependencies.description:
A stand-alone implementation of several NumPy dtype extensions used in
machine learning libraries.
dependencies.name: py-ml-dtypes

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Flax: A neural network library for JAX designed for flexibility.
dependent_to.name: py-flax

dependent_to.description:
Orbax includes a checkpointing library oriented towards JAX users,
supporting a variety of different features required by different
frameworks, including asynchronous checkpointing various types, and
various storage formats. We aim to provide a highly customizable and
composable API which maximizes flexibility for diverse use cases.
dependent_to.name: py-orbax-checkpoint

dependent_to.description:
Xarray-TensorStore is a small library that allows opening Zarr arrays
into Xarray via TensorStore, instead of the standard Zarr-Python
library.
dependent_to.name: py-xarray-tensorstore

description: Read and write large, multi-dimensional arrays.
name: py-tensorstore

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
